resource.chars:
Plate I

No 3   A muscular Fibre separated at its extremity into its Component Filaments

AAA Strice continuous across the unbroken Fibre
BB The Fibre broken into Fibrillie forming the interrupted strice
CCC Muscular Filaments forming a tasselled extremity to the Fibre
DDD Filaments retaining slight markings of the Strice





Skey.
Phil. Straw 1837
pl. 17 fig3.
